item.description:
Bob Grundy our instructor!!! he is very dedicated to this group and has been an inspiration to many new comers, in addition to people who want to come back, its a fun night out.

Counting the time we have left in this Line Dance Session. We have covered a lot of steps and know 14 dances. But it is the steps that are done in Line Dance that are important and everyone has been doing a great job learning them. Some are easier than others while each new step presents a challenge. Our next Line Dance Session will begin on September 24. If this is something you would like to try mark your calendars.

http://www.billybobs-line-couples-dancing.com/

 www.TheCladdaghPub.com

 

Dress in comfortable light clothes and wear shoes that don't stick to floor ( but not slippery either).

Bring bottled water, to stay hydrated in between sets, because you will work up a sweat.

The room has lots of fans.

Time -7-9pm

Cost- 8.00$ per class

 

This is a 10 week class started 6/11/112
item.how_to_find_us: We are on the second floor this repeats weekly

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Boot Scoot and Dance
